br.com.caelum.vraptor.view

Interface HttpResult

  • All Superinterfaces:
    View
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHttpResult

    public interface HttpResult
extends View
    A view that deals with HTTP protocol, sending status and error codes and adding headers. All methods of this interface have the same meaning as the corresponding methods on HttpServletResponse
    Author:
    Lucas Cavalcanti
